items.headline: Learn to LOVE Your Mac: Master These Keyboard/Trackpad Gestures - Be a Better Presenter, Save Time, & Get More Done!
objectives_summary: Students will be able to seamlessly navigate between apps and windows faster than they have before.
You will create more engaging content with the screen capture options you learn - Every image on your screen is fair game!
Students will become better presenters using the elegant navigation techniques detailed in this course!

objectives_summary: Make and edit beautiful videos

items.title: Cell Phone Repair: iPhone 4CDMA (Verizon and Sprint)
items.headline: Learn the tips and tricks associated with phone repairs from industry professionals.
objectives_summary: Troubleshoot, diagnose and repair a damaged iPhone 4CDMA (Verizon or Sprint). This course covers the lcd / glass repair, antennas, cameras, speakers, charging cable, microphones, home key, power and volume cable, vibrate motor and liquid damage. Once completed students will have the knowledge to repair any iPhone 4CDMA with these issues.

items.title: The iPhone 5 Repair Guide. Master The Most Popular Repairs.
items.headline: Avoid mistakes and learn the techniques, tips, and tricks associated with repairing the iPhone 5.
objectives_summary: Troubleshoot, diagnose and repair any damaged iPhone 5. This course covers the lcd and glass repair, antennas, cameras, speakers, charging cable, microphones, home key, power and volume cable, vibrate motor and liquid damage. Once completed students will have the knowledge to repair any iPhone 5 with these issues. All of these repairs in one place! What could be better!
